## Data (language view)

```{r}
data %>% 
  distinct(glottocode, branch) %>%
  mutate(lang = lang.gltc(glottocode)) %>% 
  na.omit() ->
  data_m

map.feature(lang = data_m$lang[-5],
            features = data_m$branch[-5], 
            width = 8,
            tile = "Stamen.Terrain")
```
